def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return sorted(elements, key=lambda x: x >= k)

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return [x for x in elements if x < k] + [x for x in elements if x >= k]

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return sorted(elements, key=lambda y: y>=k)

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return sorted(elements, key=k.__le__)

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return [x for f in (lambda x: x < k, lambda x: x >= k) for x in elements if f(x)]

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return [i for i in elements if i<k]+[i for i in elements if i>=k]

def split_by_value(k, elements):
    return sorted(elements, key=lambda a: a>=k)
